definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Buddhist monastery, temple or shrine (abbr. for 剎多羅, Sanskrit ksetra)

sentences.english: They also saw several aunties shopping at market.
sentences.chinese: 她們也看見幾個阿姨在巴剎裏買東西。

definition: Kinshasa, capital of the Democratic Republic of the Congo (Tw)
Nankan or Nangan township in Lienchiang county 連江縣|连江县[Lian2 jiang1 xian4] i.e. the Matsu Islands, Taiwan
Xiyu or Hsiyu township in Penghu county 澎湖縣|澎湖县[Peng2 hu2 xian4] (Pescadores Islands), Taiwan
Nanfang-ao Port in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
Erhlin town in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Nuannuan district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
